REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0356 reute s f BC-KENTUCKY-CENTRAL-LIFE 03-02 0048

TEXT.TITLE: KENTUCKY CENTRAL LIFE <KENCA> SETS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Kentucky Central Life Insurance Co said it declared a semi-annual dividend of 55 cts per share, payable March 31 to shareholders or record March 19. The dividend is equal to the company's previous semi-annual payout. Reuter
